summary:
Female Body textures differ for Humans, Ork, WoodElf, HighElf and DarkElf
Plus Three variation depending on weight slider.
descriptionHtml:
7BTextures for Female SeveNBase 7b UNP
Female Body textures differ for Humans, Ork, WoodElf, HighElf and DarkElf
Plus Three variation depending on weight slider.

[img]https://40.media.tumblr.com/6dce9ec35cad57471d19a8f6a22819b4/tumblr_nmwyby46WE1s7mtq8o1_1280.png[/img]
[img]https://40.media.tumblr.com/3a224a67a411f46bf86b115fb33e1196/tumblr_nmwyby46WE1s7mtq8o2_1280.png[/img]
[img]https://41.media.tumblr.com/bed8121cca1d31534107253985555c82/tumblr_nmwyby46WE1s7mtq8o3_1280.png[/img]
[img]https://41.media.tumblr.com/a9b94d5cf2a7673f87e160f2368fe544/tumblr_nmwyby46WE1s7mtq8o4_1280.png[/img]
[img]https://41.media.tumblr.com/13810b60b20a0936a61e60841abc6e5b/tumblr_nmwyby46WE1s7mtq8o5_1280.png[/img]
[img]https://36.media.tumblr.com/b4fcade28f52db69a0b024a34d039294/tumblr_nmwyby46WE1s7mtq8o7_1280.png[/img]
[img]https://41.media.tumblr.com/2d48853798f6189ab3c7b161ce543efe/tumblr_nmwyby46WE1s7mtq8o8_1280.png[/img]
[size=2]
Installation
Copy the files (7BTextures.esp) and the folders (textures) to the Skyrim data folder (\Steam\SteamApps\Common\Skyrim\ Data).
[/size]
------------------------------------------------
v 1.2 Lists the changes:
Update all Textures
Add new
Data\Textures\actors\character\character assets\tintmasks\femaleheadbreton_lips
Data\Textures\actors\character\character assets\tintmasks\femaleheadhighelf_lips
Data\Textures\actors\character\character assets\tintmasks\femaleheadimperial_lips
Data\Textures\actors\character\character assets\tintmasks\femaleheadnord_lips
Data\Textures\actors\character\character assets\tintmasks\femaleheadredguard_lips
------------------------------------------------
v 1.1 Lists the changes:

[b]Update all Textures
Reduce the seams effect
Add normal maps R8G8B8[/b]
